description: This file defines a custom Flutter theme called 'OceanTheme'. It provides a function to build a ColorScheme and ThemeData with specific branding and visual style, including colors, typography, app bar, card, bottom navigation, input decoration, elevated button, icon, divider, chip, and snackbar themes. It also includes a theme extension for a custom success color.

classes.name: _OceanExtraColors
classes.description: A theme extension class to expose custom success color in theme

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a customized ThemeData object configured with Ocean design tokens.
